Articles.Content: I have been orbiting around the mun for a landing, and after a few orbits i can't move. I have solar panels and it is a manned lander. I dont know what to do! I can't toggle anything. Is this a bug?

Is Physics warp on?

http://www.kerbalcomics.com/2012/11/11/episode-16-troubleshooting/
I've had things stop responding a couple of times and found out I could "unstick" myself by cycling through camera views a few times. ("V" by default.) Worth a try at least.
Whoops! Just a bug. Went back to space center, reopened flight and it went back to normal.
